member.name: DRAGLISTINFO
member.summary: Contains information about a drag event. The pointer to DRAGLISTINFO is passed as thelParam parameter of the drag list message.

summary.para: The notification code that specifies the type of drag event. This member can be one of the following values:

listheader.description: The user has clicked the left mouse button on a list item.
The user has canceled the drag operation by clicking the right mouse button or pressing the ESC key.
The user has moved the mouse while dragging an item.
The user has released the left mouse button, completing a drag operation.

member.name: DRAGLISTINFO.hWnd
member.summary: A handle to the drag list box.

member.name: DRAGLISTINFO.ptCursor
member.summary: A structure that contains the current x- and y-coordinates of the mouse cursor.
